daily_activities: Start the day at 8:00 AM from the hotel by cab
Visit the City Palace, a majestic palace showcasing the blend of Rajasthani and Mughal architecture, by walking
Explore the Jagdish Temple, a beautiful Hindu temple dedicated to Lord Vishnu, by walking
Take a break for lunch at a local restaurant, reach there by walking
Begin the day at 9:00 AM from the hotel by bus
Visit the Sahelion-ki-Bari, a beautiful garden built for the royal ladies, by getting off the bus and walking
Take a boat ride on Lake Pichola, offering stunning views of the city, by walking to the lake and taking a boat
Explore the Monsoon Palace, also known as the Sajjangarh Palace, by taking a cab
Start the day at 8:00 AM from the hotel by train to the nearby village
Visit the Eklingji Temple, a historic Hindu temple dedicated to Lord Shiva, by getting off the train and walking
Explore the Nagda Temple, a beautiful ancient temple showcasing the architecture of the region, by taking a cab
Return to Udaipur by train and spend the evening shopping at the local market, reach there by walking

travel_instructions.route_details: The most common route from Ahmedabad to Udaipur is via NH 48 and NH 58, or by train from Ahmedabad Railway Station to Udaipur City Railway Station.
